metadata.title: PM praises security forces for eliminating terrorists in Balochistan

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 3 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Friday praised the security forces for eliminating seven Indian-backed terrorists from the group Fitna Al-Khawarij in Sherani district, Balochistan. The Prime Minister stated that the terrorists, who targeted innocent and unarmed civilians, had been decisively defeated. "We will uproot the menace of terrorism," he said in a statement issued by the Prime Minister Office. He reaffirmed that the government and security forces remain fully committed to eradicating terrorism from the country. "We will never allow those who seek to harm Pakistan's integrity to succeed," he added
